data.eml:eml: Names and publication dates of the Brachyura in F. É. Guérin (Guérin-Méneville) (Crustacea: Decapoda)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Low, Martyn E. Y., Ng, Peter K. L., Evenhuis, Neal L. (2013): Names and publication dates of the Brachyura in F. É. Guérin (Guérin-Méneville) (Crustacea: Decapoda). Zootaxa 3736 (2): 101-127, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3736.2.1
